About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Who am I?

I am a FULL-STACK developer/college student.I have built full stack projects,worked on projects using AI,mentored new college students as a part of Pclubuiet.

Full-Stack Developer

I have taken part in many hackathons,worked alone and in teams.

Some tech I use:

Frontend:
HTML5,CSS,JS,REACTJS
BACKEND:
NODEJS,MONGODB,MYSQL

Mentor

I genuinely care about people, and love helping new college students in getting started with programming and development.

Pclubuiet

Programming club of UIET teaches free courses to students on technologies like AI,BLOCKCHAIN & Web Development and organize events like AI Saturdays,Software Freedom Day,KDE conference etc
